4076,Enabling the sales reps to do deeper discovery questions,feature,brian@realm.security,,"Requestor - Pete
More about what we can do.  Can we get a list of the integrations for the next 3 months.  Devon - We should take the whole list down to 45.
There will be some we don't have.  If we hear them we just make notes.
Feedback from Codex:

- 4076 “deeper discovery + 45-integration roadmap” (docs/V2/epic-4064-exported-at-20251208T1640+0000.csv (line 2)): the app still just exposes a static multi-select of 19 sources with no notion of an upcoming integration list nor any way to capture “make notes when we don’t have it” feedback (index.html (line 132), src/data/catalog.ts (line 24)). Nothing in the repo helps reps probe discovery questions beyond picking a source.
Sources confirmed from Devon's spreadsheet:
Destinations as confirmed by Devon's spreadsheet:

4067,Remove the concept of ""monthly events""",feature,brian@realm.security,brian@realm.security,"Requestor - Devon

column1: Feedback from Codex:

- 4067 “remove the concept of monthly events” (docs/V2/epic-4064-exported-at-20251208T1640+0000.csv (line 7)): the results card prominently surfaces “Monthly events” and every calculation multiplies daily traffic by 30 days (index.html (line 265), src/main.ts (line 240)), so the concept is still front-and-center.",true,2025/12/05 10:50:54,2025/12/08 12:39:07,2025/12/08 12:46:31,2025/12/08 12:46:31,2025/12/08 12:46:31,,0,,false,false,,,,,Done,4064,Realm Cost Calculator V2,,,,,-05:00,false,67f3f34d-e8c7-46dd-93de-0ea822350c17,Sales Enablement,in progress,false,2025/12/05 10:48:49,2025/12/08 12:32:04,,,,,,,,,,Standard,500000005,,,,,,,
4068,Display: Average log reduction %  i could get with a tool like realm based on my sources,feature,brian@realm.security,,"Requestor - Devon
Response from Codex:

- 4068 “show average log reduction % + projected annual savings” (docs/V2/epic-4064-exported-at-20251208T1640+0000.csv (line 8)): the code computes an internal averageOptimization but only tucks the % away in a tooltip string (src/main.ts (line 933)), and the UI never promotes the metric nor any annualized savings (only monthly outputs exist in index.html (lines 235-307)).

Projected annual savings from that reduction based on the SIEM cost,Backlog,4064,Realm Cost Calculator V2,,,,,-05:00,false,67f3f34d-e8c7-46dd-93de-0ea822350c17,Sales Enablement,in progress,false,2025/12/05 10:48:49,2025/12/08 12:32:04,,,,,,,,,,Standard,500000005,,,,,,,
4077,Update the source,feature,brian@realm.security,,Requestor - Devon
Should include every item  here:
[Data Source - Priority - Google Sheets](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13HWvQryYTeurnYlyU1XTXNMvxmnIlmo7zv34nGffZDo/edit?gid=0#gid=0)

- 4077 “update the source list from the Google Sheet” (docs/V2/epic-4064-exported-at-20251208T1640+0000.csv (line 10)): all pricing and optimization data remain hard-coded in TypeScript (src/data/catalog.ts (line 24), src/data/cost-model.ts (line 1)); there is no ingestion of the referenced sheet or any sync workflow.
Here is a copy of all of the sources Realm Security will cover:
Cost Data provided by Pete -
$500k for 1TB in SIEM, Realm costs $70k per TB which includes data haven.
Brian - Costs of REAM is from product costs in Hubspot.
Firewall - 70%, Network - 60%, Endpoint - 50% reduction - Pete (Make it fixed points, and remove any nunance data from customers).
Total savings relative to cost of Realm, output would be an ROI ratio, total data reduced, aggregate volume and ratio relative to realm.
Said another way
Output will be total percentage of reduction, aggregate volume reduced and ratio of ROI. if we are saving them 220 and its 2X the cost of Realm. - Pete
Says ""Including the cost of REALM.  It needs to be super clear."" - Devon
Unlike our competitors we are transparent about our costs, and our integrations. - Matt
Response from Codex:

- 4070 “display costs w/ $500k per TB SIEM vs $70k per TB Realm, ROI ratio, total data reduced, and make Realm cost crystal clear” (docs/V2/epic-4064-exported-at-20251208T1640+0000.csv (line 14)): the model still uses per-million-event rates taken from the catalog arrays (src/main.ts (line 245), src/data/catalog.ts (line 24)) and only outputs Current Cost vs With Realm (index.html (lines 269-305)); there is no TB-based pricing, no ROI ratio, no aggregate reduction summary, and Realm platform fees only appear in tooltip copy.",true,2025/12/05 10:52:08,2025/12/08 13:26:51,2025/12/08 13:26:51,2025/12/08 13:26:51,2025/12/08 13:26:51,,0,,false,false,,,,[ ] Total Cost including Realm Focus (should include realm annual price);[ ] Total Cost without Realm Focus (should be much higher),Done,4064,Realm Cost Calculator V2,,,,,-05:00,false,67f3f34d-e8c7-46dd-93de-0ea822350c17,Sales Enablement,in progress,false,2025/12/05 10:48:49,2025/12/08 12:32:04,,,,,,,,,,Standard,500000005,,,,,,,
4073,Capture Data for Each Rep,feature,brian@realm.security,,"Requestor - Pete
Response from Codex:

- 4073 “capture data for each rep” (docs/V2/epic-4064-exported-at-20251208T1640+0000.csv (line 30)): the experience is an anonymous calculator with a PDF export form (index.html (lines 309-359)) and purely client-side state (src/main.ts (lines 300-389)); there is no per-rep login, storage, or session recovery.",false,2025/12/05 10:53:24,,2025/12/08 11:55:10,2025/12/05 10:53:24,,,0,,false,false,,,,,Backlog,4064,Realm Cost Calculator V2,,,,,-05:00,false,67f3f34d-e8c7-46dd-93de-0ea822350c17,Sales Enablement,in progress,false,2025/12/05 10:48:49,2025/12/08 12:32:04,,,,,,,,,,Standard,500000005,,,,,,,
4074,"Agreement on The Associated Costs, and Reductions",feature,brian@realm.security,,"Requestor: Brian
Response from Codex:

- 4074 “agreement on the associated costs and reductions” (docs/V2/epic-4064-exported-at-20251208T1640+0000.csv (line 31)): the reduction/fee constants are embedded in code comments and not surfaced for review (src/data/cost-model.ts (lines 1-74)), so there is no mechanism to confirm the numbers with the stakeholders who provided the new assumptions.",false,2025/12/05 10:53:58,,2025/12/08 11:55:34,2025/12/05 10:53:58,,,0,,false,false,,,,,Backlog,4064,Realm Cost Calculator V2,,,,,-05:00,false,67f3f34d-e8c7-46dd-93de-0ea822350c17,Sales Enablement,in progress,false,2025/12/05 10:48:49,2025/12/08 12:32:04,,,,,,,,,,Standard,500000005,,,,,,,
4075,"Elimination of any speculation or ""Bullshit"" before production",feature,brian@realm.security,,"Requestor - Matt
If it comes across as a marketing tool.  If it's a honest as we can be it has value otherwise, we shouldn't do anything else.  This will help us gain credibility if we don't have anything to defend.
Even a sales person could do it.  Matt will give you a demo you don't have to POC.  We've already established the ROI, youve agreed functionality and usecase has value.
Response from Codex:

- 4075 “eliminate speculation/marketing spin” (docs/V2/epic-4064-exported-at-20251208T1640+0000.csv (line 32)): the landing copy still reads like a marketing page (index.html (lines 108-175)) and even includes a gated competitor comparison toggle (src/main.ts (lines 37-59)), which conflicts with the directive to keep it strictly factual and sales-rep-ready.",false,2025/12/05 11:21:29,,2025/12/08 11:55:58,2025/12/05 11:21:29,,,0,,false,false,,,,,Backlog,4064,Realm Cost Calculator V2,,,,,-05:00,false,67f3f34d-e8c7-46dd-93de-0ea822350c17,Sales Enablement,in progress,false,2025/12/05 10:48:49,2025/12/08 12:32:04,,,,,,,,,,Standard,500000005,,,,,,,
4066,Display the associated Realm Costs in plain terms,feature,brian@realm.security,,"Requestor - Devon
Response from Codex:

- 4066 “display associated Realm costs in plain terms” (docs/V2/epic-4064-exported-at-20251208T1640+0000.csv (line 37)): the only Realm-specific number is the combined “With Realm” total (index.html (line 289)), while the detailed breakdown (legacy tooling removed, provider ingest reduced, platform fee added) lives inside a tooltip (src/main.ts (lines 933-945)), so costs are not visible “in plain terms.”",false,2025/12/05 10:50:32,,2025/12/08 11:56:17,2025/12/05 10:50:32,,,0,,false,false,,,,,Backlog,4064,Realm Cost Calculator V2,,,,,-05:00,false,67f3f34d-e8c7-46dd-93de-0ea822350c17,Sales Enablement,in progress,false,2025/12/05 10:48:49,2025/12/08 12:32:04,,,,,,,,,,Standard,500000005,,,,,,,
4065,Remove Source costs,feature,brian@realm.security,brian@realm.security,"Requestor - Pete
Response from Codex:

- 4065 “remove source costs” (docs/V2/epic-4064-exported-at-20251208T1640+0000.csv (line 38)): the workflow still begins with picking one or more sources and uses their per-million-event egress rates in every calculation (index.html (lines 132-170), src/main.ts (lines 235-262)), so source cost modeling hasn’t been removed.",true,2025/12/05 10:49:05,2025/12/08 12:32:04,2025/12/08 12:46:27,2025/12/08 12:46:27,2025/12/08 12:46:27,,0,,false,false,,,,,Done,4064,Realm Cost Calculator V2,,,,,-05:00,false,67f3f34d-e8c7-46dd-93de-0ea822350c17,Sales Enablement,in progress,false,2025/12/05 10:48:49,2025/12/08 12:32:04,,,,,,,,,,Standard,500000005,,,,,,,
